text:
THE FLORIDA STATE UNIVERSITY
UNIVERSITY BROADCASTING SERVICES
TALLAHASSEE 32306
April 18, 1967
Dear Jerry:
These are the latest letters exchanged on legislation — most
by me, one from Don Holloway to Senator Pastore.
Claude Pepper,without my having written him first, sent a copy of
his remarks to the Subcommittee which I thought were very effective.
LeRoy Collins is willing to write letters if I will draft them. Please
let me know by phone immediately (if you have not already returned my
phone call) what we need him to do.
There were a few other items I have to discuss with you when you
have a moment. I gather the hearings went off in great style. I’ll
be looking forward to receiving the taped coverage.
Peace!
Lit
Marjorie Newman
MN/je
